clean_data: Princeton USA Senior Developer Princeton USA Senior span lDeveloperspan Atlassian Expert Jira Confluence Developer Plano TX Over 8 years of experience as a Software Developer in Analysis Design Development Testing and Implementation of applications on JavaJ2EE technologies Over 4 years of experience as a Senior Atlassian Plugin Developer in leading a team of 5 executing sprint planning conducting daily standup Retrospective meeting breaking requirement in Stories Epics Component using Jira and capturing technical design discussion and architecture in Confluence Developing plugins for Jira Confluence Bitbucket Jira Service Desk Configuring and designing Jira Workflow Jira Post Functions Jira Conditions writing Groovy Script to run using Script Runner customizing Email Template creating Jira and Confluence theme helping in branding and customization Jira Confluence and all other Atlassian tools Developing Confluence Cloud Plugin using Spring Boot Microservices Experience in developing Web based applications in J2EE including Spring Hibernate Struts Servlets JSP JDBC JPA JavaBeans Spring Boot Web Services Experience in designing User Experience UX and development of visually appealing User Interactive UI Web Pages using HTML5 CSS3 Bootstrap JavaScript jQuery and AngularJS Working experience in developing applications using frameworks like Struts Spring framework Spring Boot Hibernate ORM Working experience in producingconsuming web services REST SOAP Creating API documents using Swagger Sponsorship required to work in the US Work Experience Princeton USA Senior Developer Addteq Inc January 2016 to Present EXCELLENTABLE Plugin for Server and Cloud Confluence This is a Confluence app which brings Excel capabilities within Confluence It has almost all the features which a spreadsheet software may offer with few additional features like import a workbook and export your Confluence Excellentable data as PDF Excel HTML or CSV files User can also share a Excellentable with other use and apply column filter and global filter to show only intended rows It also provides a way to see the edit history of a workbook and restore to one of the previous versions Added multiple features to the plugin few of them are REST APIs Versioning Share Excellentable with other users Import and Export The plugin at the core is using Webwork framework to create actions Jersey to write REST APIs and Active Objects for data persistence The plugin have few listeners to keep an eye on Confluence pagetemplate created and updated events which are being used by the app It also makes use of Velocity Soy for templating jQuery CSS to make the interface usable and responsive and other few libraries in order to fulfill the requirement Skills used Java Servlet Struts Active Object ORM Spring IOC XML Spring Boot Spring Scanner JQuery Apache Tomcat MySql Apache POI SpreadJS Mockito Velocity Template Soy Template Swagger EXTENDED SEARCH PLUGIN Confluence Plugin This app enhance the Confluence search by adding external content third party application within Confluence and redirecting user to see the whole content if user clicks on the search result The app also provides synonym search which brings search results based on the synonyms to the original search term The synonyms can be defined in the admin screen of the app Created requirement document and convert into stories Created mockups to depict how the plugin admin screen will appear Created a module to update Lucene search index every time a user createsupdates a page Created admin screen where user can define synonyms and persist them using active object Exposed a REST API which can be consumed by third party application to send the data to be indexed at Confluence level by the plugin by introducing custom content type Enhanced the Confluence search abilities to detect the external content being added and show in the search result Wrote a scheduler which cleans the external content after its expiry date SEARCH ANALYTICS PLUGIN Confluence plugin A search analytics plugin which captures all the search being done in a Confluence instance and creates reports The global report can be seen by Confluence admin only and theres another report which is generated on Space level which can be seen as per permission set on the admin screen provided by the app Created requirement document and convert into stories Created mockups to depict how the search report will appear to the customer Created a macro which shows search report on every space based on the searches done by users under the given space and make it visible to only space admin Created an admin screen in the plugin where the space admin can be configured RESPONSIBILITIES Mentoring new joinee and guide them to bring up to the sprints velocity Involved in all the phases of the project development requirements gathering analysis design development coding and testing Implemented major concepts of the application using Core Java J2EE Servlets Velocity Soy Template Thymeleaf JDBC MVC Spring Framework Active Objects Java Beans XML Used J2EE and Enterprise design patterns like MVC front controller business delegate data access object value object etc Implemented REST based microservices using Spring framework Jersey API Used REST Client and POSTMAN and CURL to test the services Developed REST controllers using Spring Data REST to serve the UI with required JSON data Environment Core Java J2EE Servlets JSP JDBC Spring Hibernate ORM SOAP REST Microservices Postman Spring Data REST DAO Maven Jenkins Oracle JUnit GitHub PLSQL SQL Tomcat Application Server Senior Developer Addteq Inc Pune Maharashtra October 2013 to January 2016 OFFICE ADMIN Confluence Plugin A Confluence plugin which allows users to add a macro with the image of floor plan and tag employees and physical resources into the image It allows user to add custom fields under users profile page and enhance the people search in the Confluence This plugin also have avatar feature where user can add hisher profile photo and can be seen across applications as long as those applications support avatar configuration Changing profile photo in Confluence also change the profile photo of all the configured applications My responsibilities include understanding requirements developing features from scratch supporting and fixing bugs Developed two macros which allows user to add floor plan and flow diagram and tag the entities in the diagrams Developed custom user profile page enhanced the Confluence People search and also created avatar features which make use of Jersey to write REST web services Active Objects to persist data Wrote jUnit code to unit test the modules FILE BROWSER Confluence plugin A Confluence plugin which allows user to insert a macro in Confluence page with the SMB path and the macro shows all the directory on the given path within Confluence User can view delete create directoryfile throw this plugin My role in this involves understand the requirement and develop the features Created UI to show the directory tree in the Confluence using jQuery and Velocity template Wrote Java API which takes the SMB path as input and iterated throw directories to create tree of model objects and send response using REST API Wrote REST api to serve the response Developed jUnit code to unit test the modules REMEDY JIRA CONNECTOR Jira Plugin The requirement for this project was to integrate JIRA with another well known issue tracking tool Remedy in a fashion where every single issue created at Remedy will be reported and synced with JIRA and viceversa Developed SOAP client to make call the Remedy and bring newly created tickets on the other end and create similar tickets in the JIRA and any failed transaction will be captured at JIRA to be attempted later in sometime Wrote a scheduler which looks for the failed transactions in the database and reattempt to complete the transaction and mark it completed Used XWORK to write action class Active Object to persist data and developer Scheduler module for scheduled jobs INTELLIJ IDEA ALERT PLUGIN IntelliJ Idea and Jira Plugin integration Create an IntelliJ IDEA plugin which make use of git branches in the IDE and brings latest updates from JIRA and shows natively in the IntelliJ Idea to keep the developer in the context and get JIRA updates without changing the tool Created an IntelliJ IDEA module using the same IDE and wrote a listener which keep JIRA in check for any new updates available in the comment section Created a configuration screen where developer can configure their JIRA instance details such as JIRA URL username password MISCELLANEOUS PLUGIN Jira Plugin Groovy Scripts Jira Workflow Post functions Creating Jira Workflow Creating Post functions to automate issue transitions and get desired result Created automated Jira issue creation where based on resolution on one issue createclose other issues and wrote various such Jira automation scripts The requirement was converting all the groovy scripts into different modules under a single JIRA plugin which replaces the need of upgrading groovy scripts every time JIRA gets an upgrade and also safe JIRA from the groovys potential of modifying JIRA home directory Wrote various kind of JIRA workflow listeners to replace groovy scripts and create JIRA plugin modules Code review and discussing approach with team and help them contribute in the project Skills used Java Servlet Struts Active Object ORM Spring IOC XML Spring Boot Spring Scanner JQuery Apache Tomcat MySql Velocity Template Soy Template RESPONSIBILITIES Involved in all the phases of the project development requirements gathering analysis design development coding and testing Implemented major concepts of the application using Groovy Script Core Java JSP Servlets Velocity Soy Template Thymeleaf JDBC MVC Active Objects Java Beans XML HTML CSS jQuery JavaScript Backbone JS Worked implemented and maintained an MVC and DAO architecture utilizing the Spring framework Environment Core Java J2EE Servlets JSP JDBC Spring Hibernate ORM SOAP REST Microservices Postman Spring Data REST DAO Maven Jira Bitbucket Bamboo Confluence Agile Configuring jira Post function Software Engineer Fiserv Pune Maharashtra September 2012 to September 2013 Actively participated in different phases of the Software Development Life Cycle SDLC includes requirement gathering creating usecase diagrams class diagrams Took part in the design and development of various components using Core Java and Oracle Used Eclipse IDE for designing coding and developing applications Writing java code and respective JUnit for all types of bugs and enhancements to the existing product Writing javascript changes as per the requirement Worked on stored procedures PLSQL and SQL queries Supported the application during deployment and production phases Environment Core Java Oracle HTML XHTML CSS JSP and Apache Tomcat Software Engineer QLC Pune Maharashtra December 2010 to September 2012 Wrote Professional Networking application named GoSoCio in JAVA that helps employee to connect with their colleagues share skills create group discussion and enable to chat in the same organization Responsible for architecture design and development tasks supporting the implementation of the above mentioned application Wrote Document Management Application in JAVA that is included with the GoSoCio enables employee to manage files and folders on the fly and can share with colleagues Responsible for writing API to upload delete the document along with versioning sharing searching the document Wrote API to add delete edit folder and showing directory using JSON jQuery Environment Java 5 Tomcat 6 MVC framework MySQL NetBeans Struts Spring Jackrabbit JCR20 JSP 20 XML JavaScript jQuery AJAX JSON Education Master Of Computer Application in Computer Application University Of Pune Pune Maharashtra June 2008 to June 2011
